replies.author: yhr
replies.txt_content:
org.lwjgl.LWJGLException: Pixel format not accelerated复制代码
这是个常见的的报错，原因多半是因为显卡驱动损坏或者过时，参见
https://help.mojang.com/customer/en/portal/articles/928791-problematic-frame-or-pixel-format-not-accelerated
或者自行百度如何升级显卡。

replies.author: hemp
replies.txt_content: 请尝试更新（重安装）你的显卡驱动

replies.author: TRely
replies.txt_content: 更新显卡驱动。英伟达官网可以更新。也可以下载鲁大师
